name: Chop!
description:
Chop that tree down! 

"Chop!" is a small, one button game where you have to try to cut a growing tree at the right size without any visual aid, and that's it!

                                             

"Chop!" was made as an assignement as part of my game design student course. 

We had to make a game as polished as possible with the theme "Growing" in the span of 50 hours, give or take 50 more...

Please tell me what you think of the game, i'd love to have some feeback :)
